DESCRIPTION: A unique resource the player can #yFocus to activate certain [#60CFFF]Spells.
Spend that amount of #ySoul in order to play the card
The Antithesis of #ySoul, #yVoid #yLevel stacks, improving the damage of #yVoid [#60CFFF]Spells, and increasing any Damage taken. #yVoid Level decrements at the beginning of each turn.
A Lingering debuff, #FFA200Infection #yLevel damages you and decrements by #b2 at the end of your turn.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
